on reading compounds: 欠員【ケツイン】vacancy, vacant position
補欠【ホケツ】filling a vacancy, supplementation, substitute, deputy, alternate, spare
出欠【シュッケツ】presence or absence, attendance (e.g. when taking a rollcall)
欠伸【アクビ】yawn, yawning, kanji "yawning" radical (radical 76)
欠缺【ケンケツ】lacuna, gap where something is lacked
kun reading compounds: 欠ける【かける】to be chipped, to be damaged, to be broken, to be lacking, to be missing, to be insufficient, to be short, to be deficient, to be negligent toward, (of the moon) to wane, to go into eclipse
欠く【かく】to chip, to nick, to break, to crack, to lack
欠くことができない【かくことができない】indispensable, essential, necessary
